Text saved: Between 100,000 and 50,000 years ago, things changed. We see signs of the first people living together. For example, we see paintings in caves. No one knows the link between this and language. Brains did not get bigger quickly. But people became smarter and their lives were not simple. Did using language make their brains get better? Or did their smarter brains start to make language?
